name: Gamebar Autodeafen
description:
Mutes Xbox Game Bar party chat (XboxPartyChatHost.exe) at a chosen percent, then automatically unmutes on death, completion, pause, restart, or exit. Includes an in-game pause-menu config for adjusting deafen/undeafen percents.

Based on the original 'AutoDeafen' mod by Lynxdeer. Built with assistance from ChatGPT.

Enabled by Default.description: Whether Gamebar Autodeafen is <co>enabled by default</c> when you load into a level for the first time. Basically enables it globally rather than per-level.

Default Percentage.description: Legacy setting from the original mod. Not used by Gamebar Autodeafen logic anymore.

Enabled in Practice Mode.description: Whether Gamebar Autodeafen should be enabled during practice mode.

Additional Debugging.description: Whether you want additional logging (for debugging). May cause extra log spam when exiting a level.

Deafen Percent.description: Percent at which to MUTE XboxPartyChatHost.exe. 0 = disabled.

Undeafen Percent.description: Percent at which to UNMUTE after being muted.
